context_summary: Health insurance plans for dogs and cats offered by SURA, which include various coverage options such as veterinary care, emergency services, and funeral assistance. The plans‚ÄîEssential, Classic, and Global‚Äîvary in their levels of coverage for veterinary expenses, preventive care, and optional civil liability, ensuring pets receive necessary medical attention while protecting owners from financial liabilities.
